short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It allows you to fill attendance values on Hilan automatically for a month with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lazy click, fill attendance values.
On Hilan website it allows you to fill attendance values
automatically for all month just by filling start date and end date.
